00532 typedef enum {
00533     PPM_VVT_NOSPACE   = -1,  // No value returned. More buffer required.
00534     PPM_VVT_ERROR     = 0,   // No value returned
00535 
00536     PPM_VVT_BOOL      = 1,   // Primitive types
00537     PPM_VVT_SCHAR     = 2,
00538     PPM_VVT_UCHAR     = 3,
00539     PPM_VVT_INT8      = 4,
00540     PPM_VVT_UNS8      = 5,
00541     PPM_VVT_INT16     = 6,
00542     PPM_VVT_UNS16     = 7,
00543     PPM_VVT_INT32     = 8,
00544     PPM_VVT_UNS32     = 9,
00545     PPM_VVT_INT64     = 10,
00546     PPM_VVT_UNS64     = 11,
00547     PPM_VVT_ADDR      = 12,
00548     PPM_VVT_FLT64     = 13,
00549 
00550     PPM_VVT_STRING    = 14,  // Single line string
00551     PPM_VVT_MULTILINE = 15,  // Multi line string
00552 } ppmViewValueType;
